    • Method Detail

      • spawn

        public static void spawn(int amount,
         Vector position,
         int size,
         Color from,
         Color to,
         double slowdown,
         double angle,
         double dAngle,
         double speed,
         double dSpeed,
         double lifetime,
         double dLifetime)
        Creates multiple particles at a position
        Parameters:
        amount - of particles to create
        position - start position
        size - size of the particles
        from - first color, a color is randomized between this..
        to - second color, .. and this color
        slowdown - how much the speed slowdown factor is per second (under 1 yields slow down, over yields speed up)
        angle - middle angle the particles can move towards, in radians
        dAngle - how much the angle can vary in radians
        speed - the speed of which particles move
        dSpeed - the amount of which the speed can vary
        lifetime - the lifetime in seconds of this particle
        dLifetime - how much the lifetime can vary
